src:
Jakub Vrána sa dostal medzi tri hviezdy týždňa v NHL
05 Nov 2019, 06:35 by Webnoviny
5.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Švédsky útočník Elias Pettersson z Vancouveru Canucks sa stal prvou hviezdou uplynulého týždňa v zámorskej hokejovej NHL. V štyroch dueloch nazbieral deväť bodov za tri góly a šesť asistencií.
Post druhej hviezdy sa ušiel českému útočníkovi Jakubovi Vránovi vo farbách Washingtonu Capitals, ktorý sa prezentoval šiestimi bodmi v troch dueloch. Až päťkrát skóroval a pripísal si prvý hetrik v profiligovej kariére.
Elitnú trojicu minulého týždňa dopĺňa kanadský brankár Mike Smith z Edmontonu Oilers. V dvoch vystúpeniach doviedol „olejárov“ k dvom triumfom a zneškodnil až 74 zo 76 striel súperov.

text:
Jakub Vrána got among the three stars of the week in the NHL
05 Nov 2019, 06:35 by Webnoviny
Swedish striker Elias Pettersson from Vancouver Canucks became the first star of the last week in the overseas hockey NHL. In four duels he scored nine points for three goals and six assists.
The position of the second star went to Czech striker Jakub Vrán in the colors of Washington Capitals, who presented six points in three duels. He scored five times and scored the first hetrik in profilig's career.
Elite trio last week is completed by Canadian goalkeeper Mike Smith of Edmonton Oilers. In two appearances, he led the "oilers" to two triumphs and defeated up to 74 out of 76 opponents.
More about the topic: NHL Source: Webnoviny.sk - Jakub Vrána got among the three stars of the week at NHL © SITA All rights reserved.
